title: Social Justice-Based OER Utilization and Technical Communication Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Technical writing and basic communication principles
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where in-service professionals analyze and apply Open Educational Resources (OER) from a social justice perspective using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Students can explain three or more strategies for creating inclusive technical documentation using OER tools.
Students can propose project-based improvements to existing TPC materials from a social equity perspective.
Students can design a collaborative content creation process in five or more stages following open license principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
